title: 10 Years Of Gay Marriage, How To Make Godzilla Roar, And Terry Crews On 'Manhood'
teaser: 10 years of gay marriage in the U.S., the sound design behind Godzilla's iconic roar, and actor Terry Crews on his new book, Manhood.
contentencoded:
It's been 10 years since same-sex couples in Massachusetts first got married, the sound designers behind the new Godzilla explain how to make the monster's iconic roar, and actor Terry Crews discusses his new book, Manhood.

Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
